scripts.compile: tsc; cp -r serverAssets/ build/ && mkdir -p build/serverAssets/bootstrap/ && cp -r node_modules/bootstrap/dist/* build/serverAssets/bootstrap/ && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js build/serverAssets/bootstrap/js/
scripts.start: NODE_ENV=development npm-run-all clean compile lint serve
scripts.docker:config: yarn && yarn compile && cp -r deploy/Dockerfile node_modules/ build/
scripts.docker:build: yarn docker:config && docker build -t ctechwebsite:latest build
